2053210.name: Super Hentai Racers
2053210.description:
Super Hentai Racers is an exciting arcade race with blazing speed and riveting challenge.

Choose one of the heroines, step on the accelerator, and compete to be the best.

Collect bonuses and use them in the fight against rival racers.
When you win a race, you get to upgrade your vehicle with powerful new modifications.
Featuring 20 crazy and unique tracks, the difficulty intensifies with every course.

Features
  • Choose from cute female race drivers
  • 4 environmental biomes and 20 race tracks
  • Collect bonuses and modify your vehicle
  • Unlock postcards based on each driver
  • Sweet, enjoyable music
2053210.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 俄语, 简体中文
